summary: Making Grass and ferns look less dead.
descriptionHtml:
Firstly I [b]highly [/b]recommend using the Grass on Steroids mod. It both makes landscapes look better and i optimized my mod to look best when using it, specifically i use the goldilocks version. It can be found here ---> http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33582/? <---

Many of the grass and fern textures in the game look fine but a few of the most commonly used ones are brown and lifeless. The aim of this mod is to make them look better by re-texturing them to be greener and higher(ish)-res. All texture and normal map resolutions are 1024x1024, twice the vanilla resolution but still small enough to cost as little performance as possible. 

As a texture replacer it will overwrite any other texture mods that modify the same grass and fern textures. For best results i recommend placing mod as low in your mods list as possible. 

(Optional Files)

Added alternate bark texture replacer for Aspen trees. The bark is now textured to look like Birch trees, there isn't much difference between the two other then the alternate texture looks cleaner. 

Added alternate green leaves for Aspen trees and LOD textures to match. Just as the bark option this is stand-alone.

(Future Plans)

[s]Currently working on making Aspen leaves green. The distance LOD texture for trees is refusing to cooperate but i will make the replacer available as soon as i can make it presentable.[/s] (EDIT, Done!)
author: tarskar
